name: Kliq the Video Knight
description: As you suit up in the Hurrican armor and dubbed Kliq the Knight, you are tasked to face the ultimate challenge: enter MorGHOUL's Fortress and defeat the mechanical warlord. This won't be easy, as MorGHOUL's minions, Zilog and Atari, zealously defend their leader with their lives. The fate of your world, BonkelStar, lies in your bullet-flinging hands.
